title: Exquisite Emerald and Pearl Nagas Design Haaram
features: Intricate Nagas design (serpent motif) signifying prosperity, meticulously handcrafted with floral and paisley patterns. Central emerald cabochon surrounded by sparkling CZs. Graduated pearl drops add a touch of timeless elegance. The design is a blend of traditional South Indian temple jewelry aesthetics with a modern, lightweight feel.
occasions: and grand celebrations. A statement piece for any special occasion.
description: A testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage, this haaram embodies timeless elegance and cultural significance. The use of natural emeralds and South Sea pearls, coupled with expert craftsmanship, ensures exceptional quality and enduring value. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, despite its opulent appearance. A heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
